Name: Solar Scion
About the game: Your life as a captain is over! Or is it?.. Soul fragments scattered, they've got their own plans for your essence! Make peace with your past, or blow it up! Build, bargain and battle your way back to the land of the living in this top-down strategy shooter! Do you have what it takes to be a Solar Scion? Features: Build space stations & AI ships Make & sell power-ups Upgrade planets & ships Capture control points Harvest & trade resources Beware dangerous nebulas ..On a quest to return to life!
